# Introduction

Webcasting for biostatistics is the challenge.

Lets take it one step at a time.

Start with the open source project `OBS`.

[ Welcome | OBS ]( https://obsproject.com/welcome)

Steps to get started. Work with youtube video.

[How to Use OBS Studio](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-puA85ciDEM)

goal is to be able to create short, 5 minute, videos demonstrating "real time"
data analysis. 

first project:

*   work through first 10 minutes of Dave Robinson "water" tidytuesday analysis. 
*   create a 5 minute version of the analysis in vim using rgt-R tools and
ultisnips. 
*   create a simple OBS framework for the screencast.
